description: Surrogate primary key for the asset–part association; uniquely identifies this row.
Flag indicating this part is the primary/standard component for the asset’s BOM or configuration (1=yes, 0=no). Likely denotes default fitment versus alternates; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the asset (vehicle/equipment) this part applies to; foreign key to the asset master.
Identifier of the part item referenced; foreign key to the part/item master.
Quantity of this part specified on the asset’s bill of materials or standard configuration, per asset.
Cumulative life‑to‑date quantity of this part issued/installed on the asset. Likely counts total consumption or replacements; confirm with SME.
Free‑text notes about the asset–part relationship, usage, or BOM details.
System timestamp when this row was last updated by any process or integration.
Timestamp of the latest user‑initiated update. Despite the name, values appear to be datetimes rather than a user ID; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user who created this row.
Timestamp when this row was created by a user.
Identifier of the user who last modified this row.
Timestamp when this row was last modified by a user.
